net.hudup.core.alg

Interface KBaseRemoteTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    KBase, KBaseRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BnetKB, KBaseAbstract, KBaseAbstractSerializable, KBaseRecommendIntegrated, KBaseRemoteWrapper, SvdGradientKB, SvdGradientPlusKB

    public interface KBaseRemoteTask
extends AutoCloseable
    This interface declares methods for remote knowledge base.
    Version:
    12.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Cleaning out KBase.
      void close()
      The main method of this interface, which is responsible for releasing resources occupied by auto-closable object.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Checking whether KBase is empty or not.
      void learn(Dataset dataset, Alg alg)
      This method is responsible for creating KBase or learning from specified dataset.

      This method is used to read KBase from storage system.
      void save()
      This method is used to write KBase to storage system according to internal configuration.
      void save(DataConfig storeConfig)
      This method is used to write KBase to storage system according to the specified configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load()
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used to read KBase from storage system. Storage system can be files, database, etc.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • learn

        void learn(Dataset dataset,
           Alg alg)
    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is responsible for creating KBase or learning from specified dataset. Because every model-based recommender owns distinguished KBase, the second parameter is such algorithm. The association between model-based recommender and KBase is tight. This method tells us that KBase can be learned by any approaches: machine learning, data mining, artificial intelligence, statistics, etc.
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        alg - the algorithm that owns this KBase.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • save

        void save()
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used to write KBase to storage system according to internal configuration. Storage system can be files, database, etc. This method in turn calls save(DataConfig) method.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • save

        void save(DataConfig storeConfig)
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used to write KBase to storage system according to the specified configuration. It is possible to store knowledge base anywhere according to the specified configuration. This method is called by save() method.
        Parameters:
        storeConfig - specified configuration where to store knowledge base.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • close

        void close()
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: AutoCloseable
        The main method of this interface, which is responsible for releasing resources occupied by auto-closable object. The finalize() method of auto-closable class should call AutoCloseable.close() method so that AutoCloseable.close() method is called automatically before the Java garbage collector destroys auto-closable object.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error raises.

      • clear

        void clear()
    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Cleaning out KBase. This method is stronger than method close() because it firstly deletes all storage and then calls close(). Note, after method close() was called, KBase in memory becomes empty , which means that method isEmpty() returns true but KBase is still stored in persistent storage. However, after this method was called, KBase in both memory and storage is empty but it can be re-learned. Using this method should be careful.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Checking whether KBase is empty or not. If a KBase which is empty, it needs to re-learned by calling the method learn(Dataset, Alg) again.
        Returns:
        whether knowledge base is empty or not.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.
